decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01/09; 02/09; 03/09 - Received: 11/04/2016
04/09 REV-A; 05/09 REV-A - Received: 18/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The extension [building] hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as [21 Albury Avenue, Isleworth, TW7 5HY].

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the roof extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof and side roof extension with juilette balcony and additional roof windows, porch with front canopy, conversion of garage to habitable room, alteration of existing rear extension from pitched to flat roof
